message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $950000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your offer.  While I appreciate your interest, $950000 isn't quite meeting my expectations. Let's split the difference â€“ I'm willing to come down to $1075000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested in moving forward at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've given it some thought and would like to counter with an offer of $1025000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
